title: Adds structure to Application View
body_html:
Covers rails-girls-summer-of-code/selection_process#51, "Split the application page into sections (and add Titles) like on the Application form"

@beanieboi I removed your hrs from the Submitted application section. I added sub-section titles there, and hr started adding a bit too much structure. I hope you don't mind.

I added hrs between different sections in the application view though. I don't know if it improved the view or not (not a designer) :D
